                        <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=collect_guest" href="javascript:void(0);" diss-data="fuid=2286908003" action-type="fl_favorite"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="favorite_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_favorite S_ficon">û</em><em>收藏</em></span></span></span></a>
                    </li>

                        <!-- 时间 -->
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月3日 08:14</div>
                        <!-- 时间 -->
                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E2829%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国新增2829例#</a>，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A17205%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#全国累计确诊17205例#</a>】2月2日0—24时，31个省（自治区、直辖市）和新疆生产建设兵团报告新增确诊病例2829例（湖北省2103例），新增重症病例186例（湖北省139例），新增死亡病例57例（湖北省56例，重庆市1例），新增治愈出院病例147例（湖北省80例），新增疑似 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Isrxdkeyw" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467790314822516:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467790314822516&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467778545120677" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Isreelu7z?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-03 07:07" date="1580684874000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467778545120677:fromprofile"> 2月3日 07:07</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6ghA0p" rel="nofollow">搜狗高速浏览器</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%87%8D%E5%BA%86%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E25%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A300%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#重庆新增25例累计确诊300例#</a>】2020年2月2日12—24时，重庆市报告新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎新增确诊病例25例，减少重型病例3例，新增死亡病例1例。高新区为报告首例确诊病例。<br>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;新增确诊病例中，万州区5例、涪陵区1例、江北区3例、九龙坡区2例、南岸区2例、巴南区1例、綦江区1 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Isreelu7z" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467778545120677:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467778545120677&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【愿平安！尚未发现人员伤亡！】2月3日0时5分在<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a>，震源深度21千米，震中距成都市区38公里。视频显示，成都居民下楼避险。截至凌晨1点，消防救援人员已到达清泉镇、淮口镇，尚未发现有人员伤亡。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E6%97%A5%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民日报">@人民日报</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4467705409461307:1034-video:1034%3A4467696960471059:page_100206_home:2286908003:4467705409461307:2286908003" title="人民日报的微博视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PlpS1N" alt="http://t.cn/A6PlpS1N" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民日报的微博视频</a> ​​​ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a><a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%A4%A7%E9%99%86%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E9%A2%84%E8%AD%A6%E7%BD%91%E6%8F%90%E5%89%8D8%E7%A7%92%E9%A2%84%E8%AD%A6%23&amp;from=default">#大陆地震预警网提前8秒预警#</a>】由成都市应急管理局和<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E5%87%8F%E7%81%BE%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=成都高新减灾研究所">@成都高新减灾研究所</a> 联合建设的大陆地震预警网成功预警此次地震，给成都市提前8秒预警。一些位于震中附近的手机、电视等发出预警提示，成都市安装了地震预警接收终端的小区“大喇叭”也发出了预警。此外，还通过包括四川 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Isp4B651q" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467695691449276:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467695691449276&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2899634413" usercard="id=2899634413">MC老弓</a><a target="_blank" suda-data="key=pc_apply_entry&amp;value=feed_icon" href=""><i title="" class="" node-type="daren"></i></a><a action-type="ignore_list" title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main"><em class="W_icon icon_member6"></em></a>：地震告诉我你最好待在室外 钟爷爷跟我说不要出门！ 思量一下，厕所最安全！ 最近又听说屎里有病毒。。。        </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a> 震中距成都市区38公里】成都市区震感特别强烈，根据人口热力图，有感人群超过4000万。震中位于云顶乡和清泉镇附近，距金堂县城14公里，距广汉市区31公里，距成都市区38公里。 省地震局提醒，地震后要紧急躲避，或迅速逃离建筑物，到空旷地带上躲避，<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%AD%89%E5%AE%89%E5%85%A8%E5%90%8E%E5%86%8D%E5%8F%91%E6%9C%8B%E5%8F%8B%E5%9C%88%23&amp;from=default">#等安全后再发朋友圈#</a>。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsoUHjE5i" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467689554682320:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467689554682320&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a> 市区拉响警报 网友家中吊灯疯狂摇晃震感明显】中国地震台网正式测定：今日00时05分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。 成都市区拉响警报，网友家中吊灯“疯狂”摇晃。愿平安！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E7%87%83%E6%96%B0%E9%97%BB?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=燃新闻">@燃新闻</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4467682978054567:2017607-video:2017607%3A4467682452373531:page_100206_home:2286908003:4467682978054567:2286908003" title="燃新闻的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PlXHUB" alt="http://t.cn/A6PlXHUB" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>燃新闻的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                <a name="4467681534682441" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsoHLjE7f?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-03 00:42" date="1580661746000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467681534682441:fromprofile"> 2月3日 00:42</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a> <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%9C%81%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%E4%B8%89%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%23&amp;from=default">#四川省启动三级响应#</a>】中国地震台网正式测定，2月3日0时5分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。省应急管理厅立即启动三级响应，迅速视频调度成都市核查灾情，并派出工作组前往震中核查灾情，指导抗震救援工作。 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsoHLjE7f" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467681534682441:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467681534682441&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                                                                                                    <li><a href="javascript:void(0)" action-data="id=star_1218&amp;isvip=0" action-type="fl_cardCover" suda-uatrack="key=vip_background&amp;value=feed_background_click" title="用此卡片背景">用此卡片背景</a></li>
                                                                                                                        <li><a href="javascript:void(0);" node-type="" action-type="fl_historyEdit" action-data="mid=4467675550100085&amp;domain=100206&amp;is_ori=1&amp;can_edit_count=98" suda-uatrack="">查看编辑记录</a></li>
                                                                                            <li>
                                <span class="hover">

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
                <div class="WB_face W_fl">
            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609338965&amp;ssig=JKwjULgllo" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467675550100085" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Isoy70q2h?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-03 00:18" date="1580660319000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467675550100085:fromprofile"> 2月3日 00:18</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【愿平安！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#</a> 】中国地震台网正式测定：02月03日00时05分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%8F%B0%E7%BD%91%E9%80%9F%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国地震台网速报">@中国地震台网速报</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

        <!-- 如果返回有二级评论 -->
        <!-- 为评论假写留下二级评论的样式框架评论 -->
                <div class="list_box_in S_bg3" style="display:none">
            <div class="list_ul" node-type="child_comment">

        <!-- 对一级评论的操作 -->

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD4.5%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&amp;from=default">#四川成都4.5级地震#</a> 】<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%8F%B0%E7%BD%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=中国地震台网">@中国地震台网</a> 自动测定 02月03日00时05分在四川成都市金堂县附近（北纬30.74度，东经104.53度）发生4.5级左右地震，最终结果以正式速报为准。愿平安！ ​​​​                                            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E6%85%88%E5%96%84%E6%80%BB%E4%BC%9A%E5%85%AC%E7%A4%BA%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%8D%90%E8%B5%A0%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%23&amp;from=default">#湖北慈善总会公示疫情捐赠物资#</a>】截至2月1日12时，湖北省慈善总会共接收疫情防控捐赠物资合计696.76万件（含有捐赠意向书并且正在发货的物资），实际到货376.03万件，全部为定向捐赠物资。具体物资接收及发放情况见图↓↓ (湖北省慈善总会)<a suda-uatrack="key=minicard&amp;value=pagelink_minicard_click" title="网页链接" href="http://t.cn/A6PWp5g1" alt="http://t.cn/A6PWp5g1" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>网页链接</a> ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【他和她的<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%2320200202%23&amp;from=default">#20200202#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/02/hot_wuhanjiayou_org.png" title="[武汉加油]" alt="[武汉加油]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“这是武汉金银潭医院一线医护夫妇。老公是主治医师，老婆是护士，隔着一层楼，但几乎很少能见面。今天，我拍到了他们牵手的瞬间。”2020年02月02日，人民网记者王欲然在武汉拍下这张照片时说。向<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E4%B8%AD%E7%9A%84%E9%80%86%E8%A1%8C%E8%80%85%23&amp;from=default">#疫情中的逆行者#</a>致敬！<a title="战“疫”时期的爱情：“只要你好好的，我就能好..." href="http://t.cn/A6PjK6Qb" alt="http://t.cn/A6PjK6Qb" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>战“疫”时期的爱情：“只要你好好的，我就能好...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                            <a action-data="allowForward=1&amp;url=https://weibo.com/2286908003/Iso5glOXH&amp;mid=4467657665200789&amp;name=人民网&amp;uid=2286908003&amp;domain=renminwang&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbigodr9twj20u01hcn9b" action-type="fl_forward" action-history="rec=1" href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=transfer"><span class="pos"><span class="line S_line1" node-type="forward_btn_text"><span><em class="W_ficon ficon_forward S_ficon"></em><em>378</em></span></span></span></a>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【解放军驻鄂部队开始承担武汉市民生活物资配送供应任务】驻鄂部队抗击疫情，出动50台军用卡车，将200余吨生活物资，从武汉市各大配送中心调运至武汉三镇，供应各大超市，保障武汉市民生活。市民说：“看到人民子弟兵来，我们感到心里有底了，也安心了。”<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网湖北频道">@人民网湖北频道</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsnZXtKCL" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467654377090739:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467654377090739&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=1861774272&amp;cid=4467654771807459&amp;nick=BaByALL茗月&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%9F%B3%E7%88%B1%E9%9B%86%E7%BB%93+%E5%A3%B0%E6%8F%B4%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%23&amp;from=default">#音爱集结 声援武汉#</a>】新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情，牵动每个中国人的心。最美逆行者的忘我奉献、全国驰援的物资专列、与疫魔竞速的火神山医院建成交付，无不显示着中国人民在疫情面前的众志成城。全国各行各业都在为抗击疫情贡献力量，音乐行业和全体音乐人亦火速集结：以音乐抚慰心灵，为武汉加油 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsnNLiXBq" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467646814519020:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467646814519020&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609338975&amp;ssig=ZKeh5LG%2FcG" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467643526074190" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsnIspuaO?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 22:11" date="1580652684000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467643526074190:fromprofile"> 2月2日 22:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%BE%B7%E5%9B%BD%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A%E7%97%85%E4%BE%8B%E5%A2%9E%E8%87%B310%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#德国确诊病例增至10例#</a>】德国《世界报》当地时间2月2日报道，首批从武汉撤出的德国侨民中，2人确诊感染新型冠状病毒，目前已被送往法兰克福大学医院隔离。2月1日，130名德国侨民从武汉返回法兰克福，在法兰克福附近的军营接受隔离、检测和询问。据了解，德国此前确诊8例新型肺炎 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsnIspuaO" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467643526074190:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467643526074190&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【男子<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%80%81%E8%AD%A6%E5%AF%9F%E4%B8%80%E7%AE%B1%E5%8F%A3%E7%BD%A9%E7%95%99%E5%90%8D%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E4%BA%BA%23&amp;from=default">#送警察一箱口罩留名中国人#</a><img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】1月31日，民警在江苏南京一检查站执勤时，一辆小轿车路过后停下，随后驾驶员从后备箱拿出一箱口罩，送给了民警。男子称，这些口罩是他从土耳其背回国的。民警表达感谢后询问男子姓名，他挥挥手上了车说：“中国人。 ” <a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E6%96%B0%E4%BA%AC%E6%8A%A5%E6%88%91%E4%BB%AC%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=新京报我们视频">@新京报我们视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4467640787637645:2017607-video:2017607%3A4467593642442796:page_100206_home:2286908003:4467640787637645:2286908003" title="新京报我们视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PWpsWG" alt="http://t.cn/A6PWpsWG" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>新京报我们视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                                                                                                                        <a href="javascript:void(0);" onclick="javascript:window.open('https://service.account.weibo.com/reportspam?rid=Isni88sD1&amp;from=10106&amp;type=1&amp;url=%2Fp%2Faj%2Fv6%2Fmblog%2Fmbloglist&amp;bottomnav=1&amp;wvr=5', 'newwindow', 'height=700, width=550, toolbar =yes, menubar=no, scrollbars=yes, resizable=yes, location=no, status=no');">投诉</a>

                            </li>
                                                                        </ul>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

        <div class="WB_detail">

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>

                                <a name="4467626481256169" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsngY5gMN?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 21:03" date="1580648620000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467626481256169:fromprofile"> 2月2日 21:03</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2654760651&amp;cid=4467626664922345&amp;nick=金牌小腿毛&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月2日 21:04</div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467624702404388" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Isne6a5us?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 20:56" date="1580648196000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467624702404388:fromprofile"> 2月2日 20:56</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E9%92%9F%E5%8D%97%E5%B1%B1%E7%A7%B0%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E6%88%96%E5%9C%A8%E6%9C%AA%E6%9D%A510%E5%A4%A9%E8%87%B3%E4%B8%A4%E5%91%A8%E7%8E%B0%E9%AB%98%E5%B3%B0%23&amp;from=default">#钟南山称疫情或在未来10天至两周现高峰#</a>】钟南山2日表示：“目前全国的疫情仍处于上升期，但我们判断<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E5%BA%94%E4%B8%8D%E4%BC%9A%E4%BA%A7%E7%94%9F%E5%85%A8%E5%9B%BD%E6%80%A7%E7%88%86%E5%8F%91%23&amp;from=default">#疫情应不会产生全国性爆发#</a>，而可能只为局部爆发。”钟南山说，面对此次2019-nCoV肺炎疫情，最原始最有效的方法仍是“早发现、早隔离”。“我们政府和相关部门采取了多项全国性 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Isne6a5us" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467624702404388:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467624702404388&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467619136554148" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Isn57rv24?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 20:34" date="1580646869000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467619136554148:fromprofile"> 2月2日 20:34</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

                                        <div comment_id="4467616117079814" node-type="root_comment" class="list_li S_line1 clearfix">

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467613759225987" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsmWrCI6f?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 20:13" date="1580645587000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467613759225987:fromprofile"> 2月2日 20:13</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%9C%81%E5%85%AC%E5%B8%83%E6%8E%A5%E6%94%B6%E6%8D%90%E8%B5%A0%E6%83%85%E5%86%B5%23&amp;from=default">#湖北省公布接收捐赠情况#</a>】截至2020年2月1日12时，全省累计接收社会捐赠资金691，027.05万元。其中，省级372，048.67万元，武汉市297，938.14万元。据不完全统计，截至2020年2月1日12时，全省累计接收社会捐赠物资1，002.59万件（套、个、瓶）。其中，医用防护服2.79万套，N95口罩50.2万个，其它医 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsmWrCI6f" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467613759225987:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467613759225987&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>
                                                                    <!-- 引用文件时，必须对midia_info赋值 -->
<!-- 微博心情，独立于标准的ul节点 -->
                    <div class="WB_media_wrap clearfix" node-type="feed_list_media_prev">
        <div class="media_box">
            <!--判断图片的个数，渲染图片-->
                            <!--图片个数大于1，不渲染卡片-->
                <!--TODO 只显示图片-->

                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">
                    <div class="WB_text">

                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467612974872218" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsmVbkrua?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 20:10" date="1580645400000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467612974872218:fromprofile"> 2月2日 20:10</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【隔着20厘米门缝的那份感动<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】“一位80多岁的老奶奶端起杯子想要杯水喝...门慢慢的开了，我想进门帮她把水杯放到床头柜上，老奶奶却隔着门缝伸手接过杯子，另一只手示意着‘不’，说了一声谢谢就把门关上了。老奶奶在门口内侧，我在门外，我们之间是一条宽约20厘米的门缝。如果换作平时，我们可能 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsmVbkrua" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467612974872218:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467612974872218&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月2日 20:12</div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>【中央：<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BF%9D%E9%9A%9C%E6%B9%96%E5%8C%97%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%E9%98%B2%E6%8E%A7%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%84%E9%9C%80%E8%A6%81%E6%98%AF%E9%87%8D%E4%B8%AD%E4%B9%8B%E9%87%8D%23&amp;from=default">#保障湖北疫情防控物资需要是重中之重#</a>】2日，中央应对疫情工作领导小组会议指出，保障湖北省特别是武汉市疫情防控物资需要是重中之重。国家已集中人力物力支持。会议确定，要加快湖北医院和床位建设，组织更多呼吸、重症等高水平医护人员支援湖北。抓紧弥补湖北医用口罩、 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsmFwEZBC" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467603269769936:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467603269769936&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467599071320752" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsmyL5xAs?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 19:14" date="1580642085000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467599071320752:fromprofile"> 2月2日 19:14</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【转发送别！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%B1%A0%E6%9D%80%E5%B9%B8%E5%AD%98%E8%80%85%E8%92%8B%E6%B7%91%E8%90%8D%E5%8E%BB%E4%B8%96%23&amp;from=default">#南京大屠杀幸存者蒋淑萍去世#</a>】据<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BE%B5%E5%8D%8E%E6%97%A5%E5%86%9B%E5%8D%97%E4%BA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E5%B1%A0%E6%9D%80%E9%81%87%E9%9A%BE%E5%90%8C%E8%83%9E%E7%BA%AA%E5%BF%B5%E9%A6%86?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=侵华日军南京大屠杀遇难同胞纪念馆">@侵华日军南京大屠杀遇难同胞纪念馆</a>，南京大屠杀幸存者蒋淑萍于今天（2月2日）凌晨去世，终年97岁。截至目前南京侵华日军受害者援助协会<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%99%BB%E8%AE%B0%E5%9C%A8%E5%86%8C%E5%9C%A8%E4%B8%96%E5%B9%B8%E5%AD%98%E8%80%85%E4%BB%85%E5%89%A976%E4%BD%8D%23&amp;from=default">#登记在册在世幸存者仅剩76位#</a>。老人走好！ ​​​​                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【扩散！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%97%E6%80%A5%E5%AF%BB%E8%BF%99%E4%BA%9B%E8%BD%A6%E6%AC%A1%E7%9A%84%E4%B9%98%E5%AE%A2%23&amp;from=default">#云南急寻这些车次的乘客#</a>】据大理市新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎疫情防控工作指挥部公告，湖北省武汉市武昌区1名女性，70岁，经大理州医疗机构诊断，由大理州新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例确认专家组评估确认，云南省卫健委公布，于2020年2月1日确诊为新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ismwf1SCh" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467597510448277:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467597510448277&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <span class="line S_line1"><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="S_txt1" onclick="return false" action-type="reply" action-data="ouid=2709609195&amp;cid=4467596290175504&amp;nick=茗可可amy&amp;ispower=1&amp;status_owner_user=2286908003&amp;canUploadImage=0&amp;canUploadFunnypic=1">回复</a></span>

                    <!-- 回复 -->

                    <li><span class="line S_line1">

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E9%A6%96%E4%BE%8B%E5%BA%B7%E5%A4%8D%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#甘肃首例康复患者出院#</a>】据甘肃省卫健委消息，2月2日，经省市级专家会诊，定西市陇西县1例输入性新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎患者，符合出院标准，解除隔离出院，属甘肃省首例新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎出院患者。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E7%94%98%E8%82%83%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网甘肃频道">@人民网甘肃频道</a> <a title="甘肃省首例输入性新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例..." href="http://t.cn/A6PWCAtS" alt="http://t.cn/A6PWCAtS" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_link">O</i>甘肃省首例输入性新型冠状病毒感染的肺炎病例...</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BA%91%E5%8D%97%E6%96%B0%E5%A2%9E%E7%A1%AE%E8%AF%8A6%E4%BE%8B%E7%B4%AF%E8%AE%A1105%E4%BE%8B%23&amp;from=default">#云南新增确诊6例累计105例#</a>】2月2日0时至12时，云南省报告新型冠状病毒感染肺炎新增病例6例（昭通市2例、楚雄州2例、德宏州1例、丽江市1例），其中楚雄州为首次报告确诊病例。全省累计报告确诊病例105例，除治愈出院者外，现均在定点医院接受隔离治疗。现有危重3例，重症7例，治 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ismkquot2" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467590187243896:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467590187243896&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                                <a name="4467588131952743" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ismh78bZR?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 18:31" date="1580639477000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467588131952743:fromprofile"> 2月2日 18:31</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/2O2xZO" rel="nofollow">人民网微博</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%A4%E5%90%8D%E6%82%A3%E8%80%85%E8%A2%AB%E6%B2%BB%E6%84%88%E5%86%9B%E5%8C%BB%E6%BF%80%E5%8A%A8%E8%90%BD%E6%B3%AA%23&amp;from=default">#两名患者被治愈军医激动落泪#</a>：看到你们好起来很高兴<img class="W_img_face" render="ext" src="//img.t.sinajs.cn/t4/appstyle/expression/ext/normal/8a/2018new_xin_org.png" title="[心]" alt="[心]" type="face" style="visibility: hidden;">】2月1日，武汉金银潭医院，经过陆军军医大学医疗队一周的救治，两名感染患者康复出院。据悉，这两名患者都是一线的医护人员，在工作岗位上被感染。陆军军医大学医疗队队员感动落泪，看到他们好起来很高兴！<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E8%A7%86%E9%A2%91?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民视频">@人民视频</a> <a suda-uatrack="key=tblog_card&amp;value=click_title:4467588131952743:2017607-video:2017607%3A4467506237341706:page_100206_home:2286908003:4467588131952743:2286908003" title="人民视频的秒拍视频" href="http://t.cn/A6PW9eSX" alt="http://t.cn/A6PW9eSX" action-type="feed_list_url" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_video">L</i>人民视频的秒拍视频</a> ​​​​                                            </div>

                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467585485501146" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/IsmcQn56a?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 18:20" date="1580638846000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467585485501146:fromprofile"> 2月2日 18:20</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%BD%A0%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E5%A4%A7%E5%AE%B6%E6%88%91%E5%AE%88%E6%8A%A4%E4%BD%A0%23&amp;from=default">#你守护大家我守护你#</a>【口罩预约登记第一天，现场为何如此冷清？】今天是上海市采取统一口罩预约登记的第一天，现场并没有大排长龙，甚至有些冷清。原来为了让居民能够少出门、不排队、不扎堆，街道创新性地推出“线上+线下”相结合的登记办法，居民通过小程序便可提交预约信息。<a target="_blank" render="ext" extra-data="type=atname" href="//weibo.com/n/%E4%BA%BA%E6%B0%91%E7%BD%91%E4%B8%8A%E6%B5%B7%E9%A2%91%E9%81%93?from=feed&amp;loc=at" usercard="name=人民网上海频道">@人民网上海频道</a>&nbsp;&nbsp;​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IsmcQn56a" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467585485501146:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467585485501146&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

            <div class="face"><a target="_blank" class="W_face_radius" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_pic" href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" title="人民网"><img usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" src="https://tvax3.sinaimg.cn/crop.24.3.657.657.1024/002uLDeXly8glmohn698dj60j60j6q3b02.jpg?KID=imgbed,tva&amp;Expires=1609338981&amp;ssig=8TIYy6oRV5" width="50" height="50" alt="人民网" class="W_face_radius"></a></div>
                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467583149418870" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ism94Dwhg?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 18:11" date="1580638289000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467583149418870:fromprofile"> 2月2日 18:11</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	                                            <span title="可于本微博右侧下拉菜单查看编辑记录">已编辑</span>
                                                </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【好消息！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%AD%A6%E6%B1%89%E5%B8%82%E9%87%91%E9%93%B6%E6%BD%AD%E5%8C%BB%E9%99%A2%E4%BB%8A%E5%A4%A937%E4%BA%BA%E5%87%BA%E9%99%A2%23&amp;from=default">#武汉市金银潭医院今天37人出院#</a>】2日下午2时，武汉市金银潭医院有37名确诊新型冠状病毒肺炎患者出院，是迄今为止该院出院人数最多的一天。本次出院年纪最大的患者已88岁，也是该院出院年龄最大的患者。医务人员将治愈出院的患者们送出医院大门，并嘱咐他们回家后需要居家隔离两周，医务人员 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ism94Dwhg" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467583149418870:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467583149418870&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

                                        <!-- 查看对话 -->
                    <!-- 回复 -->
                    <li>

            </div>
            <!-- 时间 -->
                            <div class="WB_from S_txt2">2月2日 18:17</div>

                                                                                                                        <a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E6%96%B0%E5%86%A0%E8%82%BA%E7%82%8E%E6%9C%80%E6%96%B0%E5%8A%A8%E6%80%81%23&amp;from=default">#新冠肺炎最新动态#</a>【不要集聚！<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E5%B1%B1%E4%B8%9C%E5%8F%91%E7%8E%B0%E8%81%9A%E9%9B%86%E6%80%A7%E7%96%AB%E6%83%8560%E8%B5%B7%23&amp;from=default">#山东发现聚集性疫情60起#</a>：其中49起为家庭聚集疫情】山东省疫情分析发现，报告发生了多起典型的家庭聚集性疫情，对总体疫情的影响也非常大。据介绍，截至目前全省已发现聚集性疫情60起，其中49起为家庭聚集性、6起同事间聚集性、5起集体暴露。平均每起聚集性疫情传播病 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ism7ZxQvI" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467582478066678:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467582478066678&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>

                        <a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/6330455165" usercard="id=6330455165">帽子多到戴不下咯</a>：每个人都认为自己是最特殊的那一个，但是在病毒眼里都是一样                    </div>

        <div class="WB_detail">
                            <div class="WB_info">
                    <a href="//weibo.com/renminwang?refer_flag=1005055013_" target="_blank" class="W_f14 W_fb S_txt1" usercard="id=2286908003&amp;type=0&amp;refer_flag=1005055013_" suda-uatrack="key=noload_singlepage&amp;value=user_name">人民网</a> <a target="_blank" href="//fuwu.biz.weibo.com"><i title="微博官方认证" class="W_icon icon_approve_co"></i></a><a title="微博会员" target="_blank" href="https://vip.weibo.com/personal?from=main" action-type="ignore_list" suda-uatrack="key=profile_head&amp;value=member_guest"><em class="W_icon icon_member7"></em></a></div>
                        <div class="WB_from S_txt2">
                                <a name="4467577835674387" target="_blank" href="/2286908003/Ism0vnOan?from=page_1002062286908003_profile&amp;wvr=6&amp;mod=weibotime" title="2020-02-02 17:50" date="1580637022000" class="S_txt2" node-type="feed_list_item_date" suda-data="key=tblog_home_new&amp;value=feed_time:4467577835674387:fromprofile"> 2月2日 17:50</a> 来自 <a class="S_txt2" suda-uatrack="key=profile_feed&amp;value=pubfrom_guest" action-type="app_source" target="_blank" href="https://app.weibo.com/t/feed/6vtZb0" rel="nofollow">微博 weibo.com</a>            	            </div>

            <div class="PCD_user_b S_bg1" node-type="follow_recommend_box" style="display:none"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民来论：疫情面前，请收起你的任性】非常时期，非常之举，非常必要。面对来势汹汹的疫情，做好居家隔离，是切断传播链的重要举措。在这个时候，因为一些人的“不小心”、“不配合”，导致了疫情的扩散，这对于前线冲锋陷阵的医护人员来说，无疑是最大的“背叛”。<a target="_blank" render="ext" suda-uatrack="key=topic_click&amp;value=click_topic" class="a_topic" extra-data="type=topic" href="//s.weibo.com/weibo?q=%23%E4%B8%87%E4%BC%97%E4%B8%80%E5%BF%83%E6%8A%97%E5%87%BB%E7%96%AB%E6%83%85%23&amp;from=default">#万众一心抗击疫情#</a>，每个人都是这 ​​​​...<a href="javascript:void(0);" action-type="widget_photoview" action-data="uid=2286908003&amp;mid=4467577835674387&amp;pid=884f7263ly1gbi758bayyj20go0gothx" suda-uatrack="key=tblog_fstt&amp;value=pop_butt_home" imagecard="pid=884f7263ly1gbi758bayyj20go0gothx"><i class="W_ficon ficon_cd_img">¡</i>查看图片</a><a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/Ism0vnOan" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467577835674387:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467577835674387&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <div class="WB_text W_f14" node-type="feed_list_content" nick-name="人民网">
                                                                                                                        【人民网评：防控也搞形式主义，要责问更要问责】抗击疫情，绝不能反而人为制造险情。频繁的现场检查督导势必调度密集的人员流动，过多的文山会海终归需要人口集聚，除了增加传播感染的几率，根本谈不上疫情防控的效率。形式主义是痼疾顽症，传染性丝毫不逊于疫情。刹住这种“传染病”，必须拿出战“疫 ​​​​...<a target="_blank" href="//weibo.com/2286908003/IslWkbqmf" class="WB_text_opt" suda-uatrack="key=original_blog_unfold&amp;value=click_unfold:4467575242722931:2286908003" action-type="fl_unfold" action-data="mid=4467575242722931&amp;is_settop&amp;is_sethot&amp;is_setfanstop&amp;is_setyoudao&amp;is_from_ad=0">展开全文<i class="W_ficon ficon_arrow_down">c</i></a>                                            </div>
                                                                <div class="WB_expand_media_box " style="display: none;" node-type="feed_list_media_disp"></div>

            <!-- 二级评论查看更多 -->
                            <div class="list_li_v2" node-type="more_child_comment">

                                                                                 【愿平安！尚未发现人员伤亡！】2月3日0时5分在<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E9%AB%98%E6%96%B0%E5%87%8F%E7%81%BE%E7%A0%94%E7%A9%B6%E6%89%80?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=成都高新减灾研究所\">@成都高新减灾研究所<\/a> 联合建设的大陆地震预警网成功预警此次地震，给成都市提前8秒预警。一些位于震中附近的手机、电视等发出预警提示，成都市安装了地震预警接收终端的小区“大喇叭”也发出了预警。此外，还通过包括四川 ​​​​...<a target=\"_blank\" target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E6%B6%88%E9%98%B2%E6%95%91%E6%8F%B4%E9%98%9F%E8%B5%B6%E8%B5%B4%E9%9C%87%E4%B8%AD%23&from=default\">#消防救援队赶赴震中#<\/a>】四川消防调派成都消防青白江区和金堂县前突小组13车68人赶赴震中侦察灾情和开展救援，并调派成都消防2支重型地震救援力量共17车120人2犬赶赴震中开展救援。同时调派德阳、绵阳、眉山、资阳、遂宁、雅安等6个消防救援支队共47车234人做好出动准 震中距成都市区38公里】成都市区震感特别强烈，根据人口热力图，有感人群超过4000万。震中位于云顶乡和清泉镇附近，距金堂县城14公里，距广汉市区31公里，距成都市区38公里。 省地震局提醒，地震后要紧急躲避，或迅速逃离建筑物，到空旷地带上躲避，<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\"                                                                                  【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" 网友家中吊灯疯狂摇晃震感明显】中国地震台网正式测定：今日00时05分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。 成都市区拉响警报，网友家中吊灯“疯狂”摇晃。愿平安！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\"                                               <\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"PCD_user_b S_bg1\" node-type=\"follow_recommend_box\" style=\"display:none\"><\/div>\n\n            <div class=\"WB_text W_f14\" node-type=\"feed_list_content\" nick-name=\"人民网\">\n                                                                                                                        【<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&from=default\">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#<\/a> <a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E7%9C%81%E5%90%AF%E5%8A%A8%E4%B8%89%E7%BA%A7%E5%93%8D%E5%BA%94%23&from=default\">#四川省启动三级响应#<\/a>】中国地震台网正式测定，2月3日0时5分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。省应急管理厅立即启动三级响应，迅速视频调度成都市核查灾情，并派出工作组前往震中核查灾情，指导抗震救援工作。 【愿平安！<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" suda-uatrack=\"key=topic_click&value=click_topic\" class=\"a_topic\" extra-data=\"type=topic\" href=\"\/\/s.weibo.com\/weibo?q=%23%E5%9B%9B%E5%B7%9D%E6%88%90%E9%83%BD%E5%8F%91%E7%94%9F5.1%E7%BA%A7%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%23&from=default\">#四川成都发生5.1级地震#<\/a> 】中国地震台网正式测定：02月03日00时05分在四川成都市青白江区（北纬30.74度，东经104.46度）发生5.1级地震，震源深度21千米。<a target=\"_blank\" render=\"ext\" extra-data=\"type=atname\" href=\"\/\/weibo.com\/n\/%E4%B8%AD%E5%9B%BD%E5%9C%B0%E9%9C%87%E5%8F%B0%E7%BD%91%E9%80%9F%E6%8A%A5?from=feed&loc=at\" usercard=\"name=中国地震台网速报\">@中国地震台网速报<\/a> ​​​​
